scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:system
scripts.test:pre-deploy: npm run test:all && npm run pytest
scripts.mobile: echo 'Access on mobile:' && echo 'HTTPS: https://'$(npm run ip --silent)':3001' && echo 'HTTP: http://'$(npm run ip --silent)':8080'
scripts.cert: echo 'Generating fresh SSL certificates...' && rm -rf certs && node -e "require('./server.js')"
scripts.tunnel: echo 'Install ngrok: npm install -g ngrok' && echo 'Then run: ngrok http 8080'
scripts.deploy: npm run test:pre-deploy && gcloud functions deploy molecular-analysis --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory 1GB --timeout 540s --region us-central1 --entry-point molecularAnalysis --source . --set-env-vars OPENAI_API_KEY=$OPENAI_API_KEY --quiet
scripts.build: npm run test:unit && echo 'Build complete - static files ready'
